words.prompt: If you __________ something, you told people about it.
__________ are the people seeking an office or honor.
To __________ is to cause someone to believe or do something.
When you make __________, you make choices.
To __________ is to choose by voting.
To __________ is to guess an amount.
Miguel went to City Hall to learn about his local __________.
If you are __________, you do things for yourself.
If you __________ , you got to where you were going.
__________ means “came to a new country to live.”
__________ means “looked at something closely and carefully.”
A __________ is a very short amount of time.
An __________ is a chance for good things.
__________ are pictures taken with a camera.
Something that is __________ is worth lots of money, or means a lot to someone.
__________ means “spoken in a very quiet voice.”
To __________ is to spring back after hitting something.
To __________ something is to picture it in your mind.
An __________ is a person who creates something for the first time.
An __________ is someone who watches something.
__________ occurs when several words or syllables in a row start with the same sound.
In a __________ poem, the lines do not need to rhyme.
A __________ is a funny poem of five lines with a specific rhyme pattern.
Kite and sight __________ because they end with the same sound.
